meaningMnemonic: If someone <kanji>tear</kanji>s all your <kanji>property</kanji> it'll lead to <vocabulary>bankruptcy</vocabulary>. With all your property torn, you're going to <vocabulary>go bankrupt</vocabulary>. What mean person did that?
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
